body:
Replacement of "HLT_CaloMHTNoPU90_PFMET90_PFMHT90_IDLoose_" with "HLT_CaloMHTNoPU90_PFMET90_PFMHT90_IDTight_", 
according to:

title: Fix path name in HLT BTV valdiation code
